name: Exsys
description:
Awake in the middle of scrap yard as a piece of garbage nobody wanted. No identity, no purpose. Don't know who you are and why you are here.
While trying to find a safe place, you found out that nobody wants you there as The System tries to eliminate you.
Now your only purpose is to fight and to survive from The System.

Exsys is a Castlevania style, rough-like, beat em up game that takes you into the rich world of The System. Fight enemies, steal and use their body part as a weapon or equip as a new body part. As you explore the world and try to escape.


Feature
  • Flexible combo system put together a skill to create a playstyle you like.
  • Steal enemies body part to use as a weapon.
  • Gain new move and ability by a steal and equip enemies body parts
  • Gain new ability by equipping a skill item in your passive slot.
  • Use item to help in the fight.
  • Immersive world to explore.
